summary: ResearchMetaMorphoGovernanceDocsBlogJobsFAQ - A trustless and efficient lending primitive with permissionless market creation. Secure, simple, formally verified, and immutable code. Efficient with better rates, higher collateralization factors, and cheaper gas costs. Flexible lending markets for any asset. Curated risk, better yield, and transparency. Lower costs, higher LLTV, and any asset borrowing. Unopinionated, immutable, and ultra-efficient building. Morpho Optimizers for better rates, liquidity access, and risk parameters. Empowering DeFi innovation with 200+ projects. Industry-leading security practices with over 23 audits. Morpho's safety ratings and formal verification. Bug bounty program. Morpho Governance for proposing and discussing changes.
